subject: Astronomical Society Observing Night
body:
Hello, Everyone. Tonight the Astronomical Society will be hosting its first ever observing night! We will meet in IESB 308 at 6 pm for a short meeting then we will go to the IESB parking lot to look at the night sky. Hope to see everyone there!
____________________________________
This email is sent through the Louisiana Tech batch email system.

subject: Black Student Union - EMT Fest
body:
Happy Wednesday Tech,

     Tonight, in University Hall at 7 pm, the Black Student Union and the Elite Modeling Troupe will be hosting a fashion/talent show for our fourth event of Black Culture Week. The show will stand as our representation of black culture and music, as each scene will be centered around a different type of blacklead music festival. If you cannot make the show, Black Student Union and the Student Government Association will also be having black history trivia at the L-Booth from 11 am to 2 pm. 

Hope to see you soon, 
Julienne M. Cyprian 
The Black Student Union Secretary
____________________________________
This email is sent through the Louisiana Tech batch email system.
